summary: This mod will make the Quartermasters at every Imperial and Stormcloak camp sell stuff that is needed to create their alliances armor and weapons and sell their own alliances armor and weapons.
descriptionHtml:
This mod will make the Quartermasters at every Imperial and Stormcloak camp sell stuff that is needed to create their alliances armor and weapons and sell their own alliances armor and weapons. Instead of selling armor and weapons like any other blacksmith. This also adds a Quartermaster to every Imperial and Stormcloak camp that didn't have one before. Also check out my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76576/?]Civil War Healers[/url] mod. If you want the Skyrim Special Edition version go [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/1025/?]here[/url]

Requirements
Skyrim

To install just download then extract folder and drag plugin into your data folder
author: LegoManIAm94
